review: Easy to hook up, navigate, and use. Also flashed with Kodi/XBMC with no issues.However, I ended up returning it to get another FireTV (not in stick form). Being able to have access to a USB port ( for accessories like keyboard mouse combos, etc) and being able to hardwire it to internet rather than depending on wi-fi throughout the house was worth the extra money to purchase the original.If you have a good wireless interent connection and are looking for a media played, I would recommend this product. At the price it's an inexpensive option to get into these products.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I gotta say, it's pretty great. I have an old (not "smart") tv, and bought this so I wouldn't have to keep my computer hooked up to the tv. it was fast to set up and does exactly what I need it to do.

review: somewhat disappointing.  wifi connection lags and fails at times for no obvious explanation when other devices stream easily.  Interface is easy.  I have not used a usb connector, instead opting for direct power.  Library of shows is very good and expanding.  But I don't use it as much because it doesn't stream well despite good wifi signal and fast internet speeds.  Will likely look to upgrade to a different product (apple tv most likely) for improved streaming and better coordination with other devices (ipad and iphone)
